alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hancock (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 6:02PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Perry, Hancock and northwestern Breckinridge Counties through 545 PM CST... At 502 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tell City to 6 miles east of St. Joseph. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hawesville around 505 PM CST. Tell City around 510 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
